s_DestinyofMika_01--.name: Several of the Lumarigon elders corrupted by the Demon King\nshifted the balance of power from light to dark by his will.\nThe creatures of darkness formed from this are known as "Kargon".

s_DestinyofMika_02--.name: Tribal division between light and dark adherents dragged on, \nand now Drachenheim is facing its greatest threat ever.

s_DestinyofMika_03--.name: To protect Mika, Layla used forbidden magic to cover her escape.\nAs a result, Layla lost all of her powers as the successor of light.

s_DestinyofMika_04--.name: Mika, you must purge the lumenstone of chaos\nand find the source of the power that Layla sent you.

s_lumieragonhistory_01--.name: The lumarigons: intelligent, strong, and unfalteringly good. When the darkness came, they joined the fight for Maple World's soul.

s_lumieragonhistory_02--.name: But these great dragons were not invincible. After their leader, the dragon master Biset, fell in battle, the lumarigons all but died out.

s_lumieragonhistory_03--.name: To save themselves, the lumarigons escaped to the sanctum of their people and entered a deep slumber.

s_lumieragonhistory_04--.name: It is said that when a new dragon master rises, the lumarigons will return to Maple World.

s_lumieragonhistory_05--.name: Over the years, the lumarigons vanished from memory. That is, until the day of the siege of Tria...

s_lumieragonhistory_06--.name: The dragon Madria rode into battle–could it have been one of these fabled lumarigons? Have they turned to the darkness?

s_lumieragonhistory_07--.name: If the lumarigons have joined the enemy, then the light of Maple World may soon be extinguished…

s_Cut_Blackstar_Crash_01--.name: What are you doing here? Got a death wish, punk?

s_Cut_Blackstar_Crash_02--.name: Ugh... It's... It's you isn't it. All this, just to find a few\ndeadbeats? You're... You're mad, Gray Wolf...

s_Cut_Blackstar_Crash_04--.name: Not another step! The boss has words for you!

s_Cut_Blackstar_Crash_05--.name: I heard someone was roughing up my men...\nBut it's just you... Gray Wolf...

s_KarKarIntro_01--.name: The power to call a dragon…\nIf I can become the Kaiser, I will claim this world... Even if I must destroy it.

s_2ndjobStory_01-JobChange_01-.name: Time and again, new threats have risen against Maple World.

s_2ndjobStory_02-JobChange_01-.name: The forces of darkness set their eyes upon the empire.

s_2ndjobStory_03-JobChange_01-.name: Sky Fortress lifted off to face this evil.

s_2ndjobStory_05-JobChange_01-.name: But in the face of such danger, Maple World's heroes refused to give up.

s_2ndjobStory_06-JobChange_01-.name: These heroes sought out new power to aid their cause.

s_2ndjobStory_07-JobChange_01-.name: The power of the light grew ever brighter.

s_2ndjobStory_09-JobChange_01-.name: And that change... began to manifest within the world itself.

s_Cut_Vivid_Dream_01--NA.name: After the latest round, vitals are stable. No negative reactions...\nSync rate hit 98%! I'm advancing both subjects to phase 3.

s_Cut_Vivid_Dream_03--NA.name: Do you remember our daring escape? I didn't leave you that day. Not really.

s_Cut_Vivid_Dream_04--NA.name: Don't let them get away! Shoot them if you have to!

s_Cut_Vivid_Dream_05--NA.name: But now you can't even recall who you were. Some details are painfully vivid,\nbut the important things—the real things—are lost in the fog. And if they hadn't found you...

s_Cut_Vivid_Dream_07--NA.name: Master! You can't trust such power to an outsider... to a human!

s_Cut_Vivid_Dream_08--NA.name: This power is their only hope.

s_Cut_Vivid_Dream_09--NA.name: They gave you a new life, new memories.

s_Cut_Vivid_Dream_10--NA.name: You forgot the torture we endured... but you also forgot me.

s_Cut_Vivid_Dream_11--NA.name: Your problem is that you lack balance.

s_Nutaman_intro_01-NutaNuta-NA.name: I await the return of my master...

s_Nutaman_intro_02-NutaNuta-NA.name: Who dares trespass in this holy place?

s_KatvanIntroMovie_05-KatvanDungeon-NA.name: And now you will be reborn!
